title: How can i improve?
body:
Hello, this may sound quite similarly to "I'm in Elo hell" kind of post in some spots but that's normal considering how toxic a small percentage of the community is during games

I'm Deathchewy and I've been a top lane main since starting league late S4. Currently this season, I'm sitting at a total of 857 ranked matches with 370 in top lane and a total win rate of 51.7% (440 wins). My point is I've got experience working in my favor but however i still manage to lose games versing less experienced match ups due to my own and my team's mistakes. Experience means everything does it not?

When i receive top lane, i rely on mainly 5-6 champions
{{champion:75}} Total games: 85  Win rate: 67-70%
{{champion:266}} Total games: 48  Win rate: 64.6%
{{champion:86}}  Total games: 28 Win rate: 64.3%
{{champion:31}} Total games: 21 Win rate: 71.4%
{{champion:83}} Total games: 18 Win rate: 72.2%
{{champion:8}} Total games: 11 Win rate: 72.7%

I'm primarily a Nasus main followed by Aatrox if Aatrox didn't have so many bad match ups working against him

When i receive my main champions, I'm quite capable of winning my lane but I don't wish to sound negative but my teammates often let me down in winning theirs too but i find my style of play a bit awkward for teamwork especially on Nasus.

I'm wondering still if there is stuff i still need to improve on and/or I just get less experienced teammates then myself.

I'd really appreciate helpful advice or criticism to help me along and maybe even a few tips from even more experienced players.

replies.body:
First up gonna use league of graphs

http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/summoner/oce/Deathchewy

If you look here, you have a 58% win rate in top lane, but you need to pick up your abilitys in support/mid/adc or always get your second role as jungler.

Fact is in solo you need to either be able to play all lanes, and play them all to a decent standard.
I understand that and i do have the backup roles of support and jungler but I've never done well in mid or adc unless I'm playing a champion i know well

Learn it then, fact is your not going to always get top, you can have a 70% win rate in top, but if your win rate everywhere else is too low, then there's a big chance you won't actually climb (not quickly anyway)

Since u top laner  do u always have tp? Good summoner spell alot of people seen to use it just to return which is ok if u getting push the tower but try using tp to help other lanes  to get ahead or use it for dragon if your team fighting for it and u seen to be play alot of passive champs top try playing play making champs dat noramly help win some games
